name: Rupal Patel
content: Rupal Patel - Bouvé College of Health Sciences Skip to main content View all people Rupal Patel PhD, CCC-SLP Professor Communication Sciences and Disorders 102 FR 617-373-5842 [email protected] View CV Education & Degrees Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), PostdoctoralAcoustics & Speech ScienceResearch AssociatePhD, Speech Language Pathology, University of TorontoMHSc, Speech Language Pathology, University of TorontoBSc, Neuropsychology, University of Calgary Overview Dr. Patel is joint appointed across the Department of Speech Language Pathology and Audiology in Bouvé College and the College of Computer and Information Science. She directs the Communication Analysis and Design Laboratory, an interdisciplinary group that conducts research along two broad themes: 1) the acquisition and impairment of speech prosody (the melody of speech) in healthy speakers and those with neuromotor disorders 2) the design of speech enhancement and learning technologies that leverage the residual and/or developing capabilities of users Website http://web.northeastern.edu/cadlab YOU ARE BOUVÉ Connect with us Have more questions about Bouvé?
